metadata.description: After the Mutant Registration Act's reinstatement spurred a battle between mutants, super heroes, and the government, it was clear to the Inhumans that anything more than... human... was not welcome on Earth. So they left, for a life among the stars. Now, after a fifty-plus year journey, they have arrived at their destination. But where could they be?
metadata.name: Inhumans 2099
